content: this pattern is inspired by cutecatrock on tiktok and torti crafts on instagram the shape of the leaves was a noticeable adjustment that i made because i just adore the look of the crocodile stitch as scales and leaves you may use this pattern for personal use as well as and to sell just please reference me fb veraquin art ig/tt modern day mononoke supplies 5mm crochet hook 4mm crochet hook optional but it makes it easier yarn ○ caron simply soft- white ○ caron simply soft- woodland heather darning needle stitch markers recommended
